facts.statement: Let n = 2k for some integer k.
facts.lean_code:
import Mathlib.Data.Int.Basic

variable (n : ℤ)

-- "Let n = 2k for some integer k"
-- This introduces a hypothesis that n is of the form 2k (i.e., n is even).
variable (h : ∃ k : ℤ, n = 2 * k)
